name: Calvin Klein CK Defy Eau De Toilette For Men 100ml
description:
Calvin Klein CK Defy Eau De Toilette For Men is a daring contrast of invigorating freshness and powerful woods. For the modern man who breaks boundaries while exploring his authentic truths and the contrasts within.

The scent opens with an addictive citrus blend highlighting crisp bergamot and fresh lavender absolute. Rugged and earthy vetiver oil—responsibly sourced from Haiti—is the heart of the fragrance, connecting the vibrant textural elements with a rich and alluring base of amber notes.

Dare to Defy.

name: Chanel Coco Noir Eau De Parfum For Women 100ml
description:
Coco Chanel Eau De Parfum For Women. Intimate, seductive and intensely brilliant. COCO NOIR is a contemporary expression of magnetic sensuality told in a modern, luminous Oriental fragrance for women.

 As a prelude, a vibrant, sophisticated burst dominated by Grapefruit sparks the curiosity. A generous heart gradually reveals the sensuality of May Rose and the remarkable note of Geranium Rose Leaf. This luminous floral facet creates a striking presence, while Venezuelan Tonka Bean and Indonesian Patchouli notes add warmth.

name: Coco Chanel Eau De Parfum For Women 100ml
description:
Coco Chanel Eau De Parfum For Women - A mysterious, provocative ambery scent that gradually reveals its contrasting notes. 

The fragrance opens with a citrus note of Sicilian mandarin and reveals a voluptuous heart of jasmine absolute, heightened with touches of ylang-ylang from the Comoros and Tunisian orange blossom. A captivating harmony possessing an enveloping trail tinged with Indonesian patchouli, benzoin and tonka.

It is a symbol of luxury, elegance, and sophistication.  This fragrance envelops your senses with notes of jasmine, ylang-ylang, rose, and sandalwood, creating an iconic scent that's sure to turn heads. heart Notes: jasmine, rose, lily of the valley and iris, while;

The gentler notes of patchouli, vetiver, Bourbon vanilla, and white musk are balanced in a new way to create a sweet and soft base.

Middle Notes: Litchi, Rose and Italian Jasmine;

Base Notes: Patchouli, Tahitian Vetiver, Bourbon Vanilla and White Musk.

This rich and powerful incense elixir unfolds in luxurious layers of bright spices, smoky dark woods and intensely aromatic oils and gums. Its addictive trail, layered with oud and warm leather notes, evokes royal fragrant ceremonies and exhilarating swirls of burning resins.

Echoing the Maison’s Luxury Naturals Perfumery philosophy, the most exquisite quality of pure frankincense from Somaliland stands-out at the heart of the composition, blended with a superb array of sustainably sourced natural ingredients.

The initial luminosity introduces the royal root vetiver that reigns majestically at the heart of Wood Blend, amplified by the textured spiciness of saffron and coriander seed. The rich depth of this woody accord transforms into the vibrant warmth of the dry down.

name: Davidoff Agar Blend Eau De Parfum For Men 100ml
description:
Davidoff Agar Blend EDP For Men 100ml. In the top notes of the fragrance, sophisticated cinnamon leaves create a slightly spicy prelude with light clove undertones to which black pepper adds a drier, fresher and more vibrant dimension. This striking overture is followed by agarwood, also known as Oud, the most expensive wood in the world. Raw and sophisticated at the same time, oud is a lush and incredibly sensuous note that introduces a mildness characteristic of the Oriental perfumery tradition. Guaiac wood oil reinforces this suave, hypnotic facet and brings soft and balsamic woody notes to the fragrance. In the drydown, emblematic ingredients of the Middle East enhance the agarwood trail. The long-lasting benzoin mingles its sweetness with the addictive mystery of ambreine and a vibrant amber accord.

Top Notes: Cinnamon, Black Pepper and Cloves;

Middle Notes:  Agarwood (Oud) and Guaiac Wood;

Base Notes: Benzoin, Agarwood (Oud) and Amber.

 

Manufactured By: Coty INC

name: Issey Miyake Leau Dissey For Men
description:
Issey Miyake L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme was created in 1994. It is a woody aquatic fragrance with yuzu as in top notes, along with notes of bergamot, lemon and tarragon. A middle note is spicy and woody: nutmeg and water lily are an exciting and unexpected accord in this composition. An end note carries an intense woody scent which is sharp and enriched with tobacco,sandalwood, cedar, vetiver and musk.

Top Notes: Yuzu, Lemon, Bergamot, Lemon Verbena, Mandarin Orange, Cypress, Calone, Coriander, Tarragon and Sage;

Middle Notes: Blue Lotus, Nutmeg, Lily-of-the-Valley, Saffron, Ceylon Cinnamon, Bourbon Geranium and Mignonette;

Base Notes: Tahitian Vetiver, Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood, Tobacco and Amber.

 

ISSEY MIYAKE

Issey Miyake is a Japanese fashion designer. He is known for his technology-driven clothing designs, exhibitions and fragrances, such as L'eau d'Issey, which became his most well-known product.

Issey Miyake Parfums launched its first fragrance, L’EAU D’ISSEY, in 1992. “L’eau” is French for “water”, and water itself was the inspiration for L’EAU D’ISSEY. ISSEY MIYAKE’s view of water as a material was the starting point for the fragrance, which had a lasting impact on the perfume world. These fragrances are produced by the same principles as ISSEY MIYAKE’s clothing design: constantly bring new fragrances that are fitting for contemporary life, based on the concept of pursuing one’s true nature.

 

Manufactured By:  Beauty prestige international

Imported By: BACCAROSE Perfumes & Beauty Products Ltd, 6th Floor, 66, Maker Chamber VI, Nariman Point, Mumbai- 400021

Country of Origin - France

name: Jaguar Classic Electric Sky Eau De Toilette For Men 100ml
description:
Sleek. Cool. Built for thrills. A fresh, magnetic scent for a man always in quest of new sensations. Prowling the world looking for the most epic sight, the most spectacular experience – whether it’s a fabulous cocktail, a dizzying view of a soaring cityscape at night, or the wide-open vistas of the road… Always on the move. Always going higher. Because the time is now or never. The sky has no limits.

name: Jaguar Pace Eau De Toilette For Men 100ml
description:
Jaguar Pace EDT For Men. The first impression created by Jaguar Pace is of a stimulating trio of strong black pepper, fresh green apples and aromatic rosemary. The heady fragrance compound Cashmeran is what comes to the fore next. This raw material is the most important ingredient because it is very complex in character; a woody amber element with a spicy, almost peppery, fresh head note. The heart note is rounded off with aromatic lavender and luxurious orris, which marry elegantly with the classic, woody aromas of the base notes which include amberwood, patchouli and crystal moss. The overall fragrance experience creates a deep feeling of well-being that we can never tire of.

Top Notes: Black Pepper, Rosemary and Green Apple;

Middle Notes: Lavender, Iris Flower and Cashmere Wood;

Base Notes: Patchouli, Amberwood and Moss.

description:
Jimmy Choo Fever EDP For Women, This fragrance opens with the rich yet vivid juicy sweetness of plum, which is blended with the fresh rosy accents of lychee and countered with the subtle bitter tones of grapefruit.

At its heart, the powdered roundness of heliotrope mingles with an exotic vanilla orchid, contrasted with ultra-feminine jasmine. It then evolves with base notes of creamy sandalwood, the balsamic warmth of benzoin and the roasted almond facets of tonka bean, giving the fragrance its carnal velvet sensuality.

The ultimate scent for a woman who is effortlessly seductive and in charge of her destiny.

Top Notes: Plum, Litchi and Grapefruit;

Middle Notes: Heliotrope, Vanilla orchid, Jasmine and Orange Blossom;

Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Benzoin, Coffee, Hazelnut and Sandalwood.

Base notes - Peach, Apricot, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber and Musk.

name: Lancome La Nuit Tresor Eau de Toilette For Women 100ml
description:
La Nuit Trésor Eau de Toilette For Women 100ml. La Nuit Trésor Eau de Toilette is a fresh and fruity edition, with green and sour flavors. The same perfumer-duo created the new composition as a floriental - fruity - musky, built around the “passionate” accord of Damascus rose. Fruity notes of raspberry, wild blackberry, litchi and black currant open the composition with an explosion of zesty citruses, including bergamot. The heart is a floral bouquet of damask roses combined with peony and lily of the valley. The base consists of patchouli, vanilla from Tahiti and white musk.

Top Notes: Pear, Tangerine and Bergamot;

Middle Notes: Strawberry, Vanilla orchid, Black Rose and Passionfruit;

Base Notes: Praline, Caramel, Litchi, Vanilla, Patchouli, Incense, Coffee, Licorice, Coumarin and Papyrus.

name: Lancome La Vie Est Belle Eau De Parfum For Woman
description:
Lancome La vie est belle EDP, Iris is the key ingredient of the perfume, surrounded by orange blossoms and jasmine in the heart. The composition’s opening provides fruity flavors of black currant and pear, while the base is warm, gourmand and powdery due to almond-like accords of tonka bean, praline, patchouli and vanilla.

Top Notes: Black Currant and Pear;

Middle Notes: iris, Jasmine and Orange Blossom;

Base Notes: Praline, Vanilla, Patchouli and Tonka Bean.

name: Lancome Miracle Eau De Parfum For Women 100ml

Lancome Miracle EDP is bursting with the zest of brilliant Freesia, peppered with Ginger and serenely balanced by warm Amber notes. A vibrant, sparkling fragrance that opens like the dawning of a new day with fresh, dewy notes of Lychee and Freesia. Its spicy heart echoes with notes of Magnolia, Jasmine, Ginger and Pepper as its warm base notes envelop you in the sensual splendour of Amber and Musk.

Top Notes: Litchi and Freesia;

Middle Notes: Magnolia, Pepper, Ginger, Mandarin Orange and Jasmine;

Base Notes: Jasmine, Musk and Amber.

name: Lancome La Nuit Tresor Eau de Parfum For Women 100ml

name: Paco Rabanne Lady Million Eau De Parfum For Women 80ml
description:
Paco Rabanne Lady Million EDP 80ml For Women. Paco Rabanne Lady Million EDP For Women is fresh, floral and woody, like a nectar of voluptuous flowers, trailing delicately but still very present.

Powerfully seductive, the sparkle of bitter orange with a touch of raspberry reveals the first breath. A burst of neroli follows, smooth and bright. But then the lethal weapon of heady orange blossom slips out of its sheath. Its narcotic sweetness bewitches and grabs all attention.

Then, joining with Arabian jasmine underlined by gardenia, the blend soars into something more carnal, yet ever subtle. Now the obsessive pulsing of patchouli enters the fray, pacifying the honey with an addictive and terribly tempting sweetness. Amber spreads to become all enveloping, floating around the beauty, following each movement and offering its most beautiful facets”.

Top Notes are Raspberry, Neroli and Amalfi Lemon.

Middle Notes are Jasmine, African Orange flower and Gardenia.

Base Notes are white honey, Patchouli and Amber.

description:

name: Swiss Arabian Shaghaf Oud Eau De Parfum For Men & Women 75ML
description:
Shaghaf Oud is an oriental oud fragrance that surrounds your passionate heart with the peerless beauty of rich, golden oud.

Shaghaf Oud opens with precious strands of saffron, also known as red gold. It merges with the seam of agarwood that starts like the source of a river, and threads itself with growing intensity through each layer of the fragrance. As the oud reaches the heart of the fragrance, it awakens an exquisite rose and nuances of delicious praline. Growing in intensity, the oud meets the warm embrace of vanilla, showering you in the perfect combination of rich, resonant agarwood and golden sweetness.

Shaghaf Oud is a unisex fragrance from Swiss Arabian Perfumes. It is ideal for warm summer days.

Top Note: Saffron;

Middle Notes: Agarwood (Oud) and Rose;

Base Notes: Agarwood (Oud), Praline and Vanilla.

name: Tabac Original Craftsman Eau De Toilette 100ml
description:
Tabac Original Craftsman Eau De Toilette 100ml by Maurer & Wirtz.

A timeless, strikingly aromatic men's fragrance that attracts attention at the start through the vibrant combination of citrus notes and pepper, radiates warmth and modernity through the sensual tonka bean and finally dips into a base of wood and leather. Individual components of the fragrance are an indication of the original freshness inherent in Tabac Original Craftsman: the sweet but tart sparkle of grapefruit, the vibrant fragrance of bergamot and precious geranium oil, known for its invigorating effect. All of these subtleties work together to give Tabac Original Craftsman its distinctive vibrancy and freshness.

  • Top note: Grapefruit, bergamot, black pepper
  • Heart notes: Lavender, geranium oil, tonka beans
  • Base note: Vetiver, patchouli, leather

Founded in 1978 in Milan, Gianni Versace is one of the leading international fashion design houses and a symbol of Italian luxury world-wide. It designs, manufactures, distributes and retails fashion and lifestyle products including haute couture, prèt-à-porter, accessories, jewellery, watches, eyewear, fragrances, and home furnishings all bearing the distinctive Medusa logo.

Donatella Versace has been Artistic Director of Versace since 1997 and has steered the brand into the 21st century. Today, Versace represents its heritage through its strong and fearless designs, while addressing a new global audience which continues to strengthen Versace’s position in contemporary culture.

Versace Pour Femme Dylan Turquoise Eau De Toilette For Women. This is a new fragrance. Versace Pour Femme Dylan Turquoise Eau De Toilette For Women was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophie Labbe.

Top notes are Lemon, Mandarin Orange and Pink Pepper;

Middle notes are Guava, Freesia, Cassis and Jasmine;

Base notes are Clearwood, Musk and Cedar.

name: Versace Eros Pour Femme Eau De Parfum For Women
description:
Versace Eros Pour Femme EDP 100ml For Women, a refined accord of lemon and jasmine, enhanced with soft and sensual woods. Attraction: Vibrant and precious, the Sicilian lemon and Calabrian bergamot draw attention with their brilliance. Delicious and inviting pomegranate seeds surprise and seduce. Desire: The jasmine infusion and the Jasmine Sambac Absolute convey an authentic and timeless femininity. Peony petals lend a velvety touch, while the luminous lemon flower exalts the floral accord and recalls Versace's tradition and homeland. Passion: Finally the ambrox is unveiled, mysterious and deep. It is accompanied by an accord of sensual woods, sandalwood and musk, revealing intense and enchanting notes.

Top Notes: Sicilian Lemon, Pomegranate and Calabrian bergamot;

Middle Notes: Lemon Blossom, Jasmine Sambac, Jasmine and Peony;

Base Notes: Musk, Ambroxan, Woodsy Notes and Sandalwood.

 

Manufactured By:  Euroitalia Srl

Imported By: BACCAROSE Perfumes & Beauty Products Ltd, 6th Floor, 66, Maker Chamber VI, Nariman Point, Mumbai- 400021

Country of Origin - Italy

name: Versace Eros Pour Femme Eau De Toilette 100ml For Women
description:
Versace Eros Pour Femme EDT 100ml For Women.  The Eau de Toilette begins with a combination of Sicilian lemon, mandarin, raspberry, white currant and Calone. The heart of jasmine contains additional white floral aromas of freesia, magnolia and orange blossom absolute. White patchouli, woods, ambrox and musk are rounding the composition off in the base.

Top Notes: Sicilian Lemon, Raspberry, White Currant, Mandarin Orange and Calone;

Middle Notes: Magnolia, Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Freesia;

Base Notes: Musk, Ambroxan, Woody Notes and Patchouli.

 

Manufactured By:  Euroitalia Srl

Imported By: BACCAROSE Perfumes & Beauty Products Ltd, 6th Floor, 66, Maker Chamber VI, Nariman Point, Mumbai- 400021

Country of Origin - Italy

name: Versace Bright Crystal Eau De Toilette For Women
description:

Peony and magnolia are in the centre of the composition, while waterly fresh lotus note moderates the intensity and sweetnes of the floral accords. The opulent base introduces amber note extracted from plants, musk and red woods.

name: Versace Bright Crystal Absolu Eau De Parfum 90ml For Women
description:
Versace Bright Crystal Absolu EDP is a floral and fruity fragrance with a musk note. The amazing vibrancy of yuzu immediately stands out between coloured and juicy pomegranate seeds creating an unusual freshness, pure and natural. The heart is enriched with inviting and velvety accents of raspberry, accented by the elegance of peony along with refined notes of magnolia and lotus flowers. Then a trail evokes an intense and voluptuous sensuality, with precious vegetal amber, deep acajou wood, bright and vibrant musk.

Top Notes: Pomegranate, Yuzu and Water Notes;

Middle Notes: Peony, Raspberry, Lotus and Magnolia;

Base Notes: Musk, Mahogany and Amber.

 

Manufactured By:  Euroitalia Srl

Imported By: BACCAROSE Perfumes & Beauty Products Ltd, 6th Floor, 66, Maker Chamber VI, Nariman Point, Mumbai- 400021

Middle Notes: Mimosa, Freesia, Water Lily and African Orange flower;

Base Notes: Musk, Guaiac Wood and Amber.

Base Notes: Guaiac Wood, Musk, Amber and Benzoin.

name: Versace Blue Jeans Eau De Toilette For Men 75ml
description:
Versace Blue Jeans is a masculine fragrance for men was launched in 1994. It opens with notes of bergamot, lemon, anise, basil and palisander tree. Its heart note includes  Geranium, rose, lavender, jasmine, sage, heliotrope and lily. description:
Versace Eros Flame for Men opens with vivacious and fresh with italian citruses, black pepper and rosemary. Pepperwood, geranium and rose facets are in the heart, before a warm base of woods, blended with tonka and vanilla.

Top Notes: Mandarin Orange, Black Pepper, Chinotto, Lemon and Rosemary;

Middle Notes: Pepper, Geranium and Rose;

Base Notes: Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Texas Cedar, Patchouli and Oakmoss.

Founded in 1978 in Milan, Gianni Versace is one of the leading international fashion design houses and a symbol of Italian luxury world-wide. It designs, manufactures, distributes and retails fashion and lifestyle products including haute couture, prèt-à-porter, accessories, jewellery, watches, eyewear, fragrances, and home furnishings all bearing the distinctive Medusa logo.

Donatella Versace has been Artistic Director of Versace since 1997 and has steered the brand into the 21st century. Today, Versace represents its heritage through its strong and fearless designs, while addressing a new global audience which continues to strengthen Versace’s position in contemporary culture.

 

Manufactured By:  Euroitalia Srl

Imported By: BACCAROSE Perfumes & Beauty Products Ltd, 6th Floor, 66, Maker Chamber VI, Nariman Point, Mumbai- 400021

Country of Origin - Italy

name: Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Toilette For Men
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Y represents a balance between freshness and strength. Like a crisp white t-shirt, notes of bergamot, sage and ginger offer a sharp juicy freshness to challenge convention and exceed all expectations. At its base, soft notes of balsam fir, cedarwood and marine ambergris embody the subtle power of a tailored black jacket that is refined, chic and surprisingly powerful. An authentic and bold creation; masculinity re-defined.

Top note: White aldehydes, bergamot, ginger.
Heart Note: Sage, geranium absolute, violet leaf
Base Note: Ambergris, incense, fir balsam, cedar, musk.

Base Notes: vetiver, cedar, tonka, amber woods, olibanum.

(YSL) Yves Saint Laurent La Nuit De L'Homme L'Intense Edp 100ml. It is composed of of deep, seductive oriental chords and reflects charisma, courage, strength and seduction of the contemporary man. Among the key ingredients are iris concrete, vanilla, tonka, patchouli, violet and sage.

Middle Notes: Vanilla and Sage;

Base Notes: Tonka Bean and Patchouli.

The opening notes of adrenaline-rich coffee give way to a vibrant heart of delicate orange blossom, energized by a thrilling aura of blue absinthe.

Top Notes: Absinthe and Boysenberry;

Middle Notes: Coffee, Jasmine Sambac and Orange Blossom;

Base Notes: Vanilla, Licorice and Sandalwood.

description:
YSL Yves Saint Laurent La Nuit De L'Homme Eau Electrique, Citrus notes of bergamot and mandarin combined with green apple form a fresh start. The classic fougere accord made of lavender, geranium and tonka bean, is modernized by the freshness of the opening, as well as orange blossom absolute and aromatic sage in the heart. Woody notes of cedar, cashmere, vetiver and patchouli, and a dose of quality vanilla end at the base.

Top Notes: Green Apple, Lemon and Mandarin Orange;

Middle Notes: Geranium, Lavender, Sage and Orange Blossom;

Base Notes: Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Cashmere Wood, Cedar, Patchouli and Vetiver.
